lb:
Reduces [Main Battery] CD by 5 seconds.
Coward upgraded to Level 2.
During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].

Unlocks Overshoot buff, for every [Main Battery Salvo] fired, increases the next shot's damage by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times, lasts till end of the battle.
Coward upgraded to Level 3.
During Day Battle, increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 10%.

[Main Battery Salvo] now has a 50% chance to penetrate the citadel of an enemy, increasing damage done by 20%.
If the penetrated target sinks, target will explode, dealing 12% damage to all other enemy ships.
Coward upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text: Can attack from long range, reload time: 20s

skills.name:
Fire All Cannons!
全砲門開け！
skills.text: 1. During battle, inflict 125% of Firepower to all enemies after first [Main Battery Salvo]

skills.name:
Fast Reload
高速装填
skills.text: 1. During battle, every time a [Main Battery Salvo] is fired, reduces Arizona's [Main Battery] CD by 1.5 seconds. Can proc up to 15 times per battle.

comment: Quiet but motherly. She almost expresses no emotions. Although her equipment is old and she is short, she gives off a threatening aura.
